title: Micklethwait: Leicester developed counter-attacking style
itunes:title: Micklethwait: Leicester developed counter-attacking style
description:
Bloomberg's John Micklethwait sits down to discuss Leicester's win on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
